translations: 使无效（invalidate 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: An official decree invalidated the vote in the capital.
sentences.translation: 一项官方法令使首都的投票失去了效力。

sentences.sentence: She judged a case in which the groom made his bride sign the prenuptial on the way to the marriage ceremony; that invalidated it.
sentences.translation: 她曾判决一起案件中的婚前协议无效，此案中，新郎在前往婚礼庆典途中强迫新娘在婚前协议书上签字。

sentences.sentence: Packages dependent on the procedure are invalidated.
sentences.translation: 依赖于这个过程的包会失效。
